description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Calamari Ring Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marinated Calamari Ring Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Ayam Honey & Soy Marinade Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine calamari rings and half of the marinade in a bowl. Set aside for 20 minutes.
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Trim beans and cut in half lengthways. Cook for 1-2 minutes or until just tender. Drain and refresh in iced water.
Heat remaining marinade in a small saucepan and for 2 minutes or until heated through.
Heat a barbecue hotplate or large non-stick frying pan on medium heat. Spread oil over hotplate. Drain calamari rings and cook for 5 minutes or until cooked through.
Remove from heat as soon as they are cooked and transfer to a bowl.
Combine beans, capsicum and rocket and arrange on a platter. Top with calamari. Spoon over warm marinade and serve.
